knimeNode.name: Extract Table Dimension
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts the number of rows and columns of the input table and outputs them as data table and flow variables.

fullDescription.intro: The number of rows and columns of the input table are extracted and written to the output table. The output table consists of two rows and one column. The first row contains the number of rows and the second row contains the number of columns of the input table. Additionally the two numbers are pushed out as flow variables.

inPort.name: Input table with dimensions to extract

ports.inPort: The input table for which dimensions are extracted.
ports.outPort: The output table containing the dimensions of the input table.
